protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

text: 1. Prepare 0.5x MS media pH5.7 with 0.7% phytoagar
2. Sow approx. 300 sterile seeds on plate
4. Place in a growth cabinet set at 21oC short days (8h light, 16 h dark)
5. Harvest plants after 10 days of growth
(Parameters: start time = 10, time unit = days, min temperature = 21, temperature unit = C, media = 0.5xMS)
1. Plant culture plates opened in a fume hood
2. Samples sprayed with either mock or DEX solutions:
4. Replace lid and return to growth chamber for 4h or 8h

protocol.text: 1. 300-600 mg Arabidopsis shoot tissue ground under liquid nitrogen     2. RNA extracted using QIAGEN - RNeasy Plant Mini Kit accoring to manufacturers instructions    3. RNA eluted in 50ul EB  (Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = PCR)
